[00:00.00]GYALIS (Explicit) - Capella Grey
[00:00.53]Lyrics by：Curtis Jackson II/Terius Gray/Dwayne Carter/Byron Thomas
[00:01.99]Composed by：Curtis Jackson II/Terius Gray/Dwayne Carter/Byron Thomas
[00:03.46]I see her
[00:05.31]She came with her n***a
[00:07.43]
[00:08.11]Mm but she gon' slide right to my side I know
[00:11.91]She pulled up with her friends
[00:13.55]
[00:14.45]Then we skrrt off in the Benz oh-oh oh
[00:17.15]Took her back to my crib and I regret it
[00:20.97]
[00:21.47]'Cause she tryna
[00:23.55]Ayy
[00:23.95]Fake like she asleep
[00:24.85]Uh
[00:25.15]Swear she tried to stay the whole week
[00:26.68]I'm like "Oh nah she gotta go" uh
[00:29.49]Ask me her name I swear I don't even f**kin' know
[00:31.66]They wanna know why di gyaldem deh pon me
[00:34.15]Dem eye green dem mind just set pon mi
[00:36.73]They wanna know why dem love him off so much
[00:39.44]Like what is the reason oh-oh oh
[00:43.30]Mm it's just the vibe I'm that guy
[00:45.33]She put her legs in the sky whenever I
[00:47.66]Pull up she got her clothes off from the walk-in
[00:50.28]She won't waste no time oh
[00:52.74]She don't want nobody else I know
[00:54.52]
[00:55.12]But I can't be what she wants
[00:57.02]They all have the same story
[00:59.76]They all want me to themselves
[01:01.97]But I'm a gyalis
[01:03.97]The city is my palace
[01:05.32]What I'ma do
[01:07.04]'Cause I want she and she and she
[01:10.37]And they love them some me
[01:12.74]I ain't the n***a they gon' say bye to
[01:14.63]I ain't the n***a you gotta lie to
[01:16.41]I ain't the n***a that you could trust on speaker
[01:18.71]When you wit' your people
[01:20.26]'Cause you know the timing I'm on
[01:22.12]I want she and she and she
[01:25.33]And they love them some me
[01:27.93]I can't even speak
[01:30.17]To all of 'em so I call her on the FaceTime
[01:32.82]She gon' pick up on the first ring
[01:34.69]
[01:35.34]Ooh I got her wrapped around my d**n finger
[01:37.76]I will never tell a soul oh no no
[01:40.60]Mm girl we grown
[01:41.83]The life of a gyalis
data.trans:
[ti:GYALIS (Explicit)]
[ar:Capella Grey]
[al:GYALIS (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.53]//
[00:01.99]//
[00:03.46]我看见她
[00:05.31]她和她的兄弟一起来的
[00:07.43]
[00:08.11]可她会主动来到我身边我知道
[00:11.91]她和朋友来找我
[00:13.55]
[00:14.45]然后我们开着奔驰飞驰
[00:17.15]带她回到我的家里我很后悔
[00:20.97]
[00:21.47]因为她想
[00:23.55]//
[00:23.95]装作她睡着了
[00:24.85]呃
[00:25.15]她发誓一整周都在我身边
[00:26.68]我说不行她得走了
[00:29.49]问我她的名字我发誓我根本不知道
[00:31.66]他们想知道为什么这些姑娘都喜欢我
[00:34.15]他们的眼睛绿了他们的心里只想着我
[00:36.73]他们想知道为什么他们那么爱他
[00:39.44]究竟是什么原因
[00:43.30]这就是氛围我就是那个人
[00:45.33]每当我和她缠绵时她总是翘着二郎腿
[00:47.66]开着豪车她在步入式厕所里脱掉衣服
[00:50.28]她不会浪费时间
[00:52.74]我知道她不想要别人
[00:54.52]
[00:55.12]但我不能成为她想要的人
[00:57.02]他们的故事都一样
[00:59.76]他们都想把我据为己有
[01:01.97]可我是个姑娘
[01:03.97]这座城市就是我的宫殿
[01:05.32]我要做什么
[01:07.04]因为我想要她
[01:10.37]他们喜欢我
[01:12.74]我不是他们会说再见的人
[01:14.63]我不是你要欺骗的人
[01:16.41]我不是你能相信的人
[01:18.71]当你和你的朋友在一起
[01:20.26]因为你知道我的时间
[01:22.12]我想要她
[01:25.33]他们喜欢我
[01:27.93]我说不出话来
[01:30.17]致所有人我和她视频通话
[01:32.82]第一次响起她就会接电话
[01:34.69]
[01:35.34]我把她掌控在手心
[01:37.76]我绝不会告诉任何人
[01:40.60]姑娘我们长大了
[01:41.83]少女的生活
